name: SAMURAI IN AFRICA
description:
SAMURAI IN AFRICA - is a cheerful and dynamic runner about a little samurai who, by the will of fate, came to desert Africa and he really needs to get home.
On your way there will be deep abysses and dangerous crevices that need to be jumped, high mountains that need to be climbed and a long, long way home.
Can you go this way with the samurai to the end?
If you are bored with endless shooters and shootouts, then SIA is what you need!

Features:

- Dynamic rhythm music
- Bright design of the world
- Interesting and challenging gameplay
- worked barriers
- Simple controls that even a child will understand.
